meta_description: The Kentucky Gateway Museum Center educates visitors by offering dynamic collections, exhibits, and a genealogical-historical library. We bring all the stories of the Maysville region into fascinating focus.
hours_text:
# Admission 

KYGMC Members and NARM Members receive unlimited visits for the length of their membership.

# **Hours & Location**

# Public Hours

***All Museum Galleries** are open Tuesday thru Saturday: 10 am – 4 pm 

Old Pogue Experience Winter Hours: Thursday -Saturday 10 am - 4 pm   

**The Research Library Closes** to researchers at 3:00 p.m. Tuesday thru Saturday

## Holiday Closings

New Year’s Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve, and Christmas Day

215 Sutton Street Maysville, Ky 41056

* * *

Looking for a unique venue for your event, conference, or company meeting? 

Call 606.564.5865 to plan your custom event!

* * *

We are Proud

to be a member of the **North American Reciprocal Museum Association**. For benefits and pricing please click the link below.

[Visit N.A.R.M](https://narmassociation.org/)

collections_text:
# Welcome to the Kentucky Gateway Museum Center, where preservation, education, and storytelling is our mission. 

## The oldest Kentucky state-chartered historical organization in continuous existence. We have been collecting, preserving, and telling the story of Kentucky and the Ohio River Valley since March 1, 1878.

[ Tickets and Memberships ](/tickets)

* * *

# FIVE EXHIBITS, ONE LOCATION

By honoring our mission, we provide guests with an exceptional experience featuring dynamic collections, engaging exhibits, a comprehensive genealogical and historical research library, and the world-renowned KSB Miniature Collection. 

[ ](/galleries)

[ ](/galleries)

[ ](/old-pogue)

[ ](/research-library)

[ ](/ksbminiatures)

* * *

# CURRENT EXHIBITS

## **National Baseball Hall Of Fame: Picturing America’s Pastime**

Baseball season is here at the [**Kentucky Gateway Museum Center**](https://www.facebook.com/kygmc?__cft__\[0\]=AZbNj2tIUAffR3TxIGniCleSyEoYNXEQCPktuWfxUTF_pnUBjdIuCUTCe-67h5t_aWbNN_4CeaRuAldavOStx5WzO7hbrcoALLratW1HHP-KMm1qVeMkqbJf7O6BtTar47QCzfPglJdxE7hGCe7aeoEchb-5Sjy7Fcb5RwBhvgJ5tEhGL1hhRDL_AEET904Zq1o&__tn__=-\]K*F).
